name: Yellow Hippo
description:
Hello! I want to introduce my game to you. This is a 2D scroller with RPG elements. The game is under development, many elements of the game will be added, some will be finalized, and some will be redone.

You are a space trucker, your job is to deliver cargo from one station to another. However, the job will not be easy. Space is not empty, the credit for the ship is not small, and there will always be those who want to take away your cargo.

Control: 

Movement - A/D

Shooting - LMB/RMB
